refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: array_intersect returns an array containing all the values of array1 that are present in all the arguments. Note that keys are preserved.

note.simpara: Two elements are considered equal if and only if (string) $elem1 === (string) $elem2. In words: when the string representation is the same.

refsect1.para: See also array_intersect_assoc, array_diff, and array_diff_assoc.
